role_description: An Ansible role that installs Docker for Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs Docker for Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux. Docker is a set of platform as a service products that use OS-level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers. Containers are isolated from one another and bundle their own software, libraries and configuration files; they can communicate with each other through well-defined channels.
